name: Gem Jumper
description:
Title: Gem Jumper (WIP)

Platform: Web Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Simple endless runner where you are an alien trying to collect the shiny gems scattered in the desert.

Instructions:
Press the Up button to start the game and jump.
Press the Enter key to restart.
Earn points by surviving and collecting gems, the more gems you collect in a row the more points you get for each gem. If you fall out of the screen its Game Over

Game Design Team:
Aidan Pohl – Game Designer
